mapper.insert: insert into log_mod_info ( log_id, host_ip, log_op_code, log_op_name, oper_menu, oper_button, request_params, request_method, log_dt, SYS_LOG_TYPE ) values ( SEQ_log_mod_info.Nextval, #{host_ip, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{log_op_code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{log_op_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oper_menu, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oper_button, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{request_params, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{request_method, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate, '1' )
